text: The Association of Chamber of Commerce Executives is an organization for leaders of local chambers of commerce in the United States. It was founded in 1914. ACCE's president is Mick Fleming, the author of Making Your Chamber Make a Difference and a former leader with the Business Council of New York State. The chairman of ACCE is Jay Chesshir, President & CEO of the Little Rock Regional Chamber of Commerce. The ACCE is headquartered in Alexandria, Virginia. ==External links== *ACCE official website ==References== Category:Organizations established in 1914 Category:Chambers of commerce Category:Trade associations based in the United States Category:Organizations based in Alexandria, Virginia
title: Association of Chamber of Commerce Executives
